name: civil-services-city-council-tx-san-antonio
description: City Council Data for San Antonio, TX ( JSON, XML, CSV, SQL & YML formats )

scripts.json-to-yml:
if ( test -e ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ); then ./node_modules/.bin/json2yaml ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json > ./city-council/data/city-council-data.yml && echo '✓ Updated city-council/data/city-council-data.yml'; else echo '
× Missing ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.json-to-xml:
if ( test -e ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ); then node ./.scripts/json-to-xml.js && echo '✓ Updated city-council/data/city-council-data.xml'; else echo '
× Missing ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.csv-to-sql:
if ( test -e ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ); then node ./.scripts/csv-to-sql.js && echo '✓ Updated city-council/data/city-council-data.sql'; else echo '
× Missing ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.csv-to-json:
if ( test -e ./city-council/data/city-council-data.csv ); then ./node_modules/.bin/csvtojson ./city-council/data/city-council-data.csv > ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json && json-pretty-print ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json && sed -i '' 's/""/null/g'  ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json && sed -i '' 's/"district": 0/"district": null/g'  ./city-council/data/city-council-data.json && echo '✓ Updated city-council/data/city-council-data.json'; else echo '
× Missing ./city-council/data/city-council-data.csv ( npm run -s convert-csv )
'; fi
scripts.convert-csv:
if ( test -e ./source/city-council-data.csv ); then node ./.scripts/convert-csv.js; else echo '
× Missing ./source/city-council-data.csv ( see ./source/README.md )
'; fi
scripts.build-images:
npm run -s resize-headshots && npm run -s resize-backgrounds && echo '
☆ Image Conversion Complete
'
scripts.build-data:
if ( test -e ./city-council/data/city-council-data.csv ); then npm run -s csv-to-json && npm run -s json-to-yml && npm run -s json-to-xml && npm run -s csv-to-sql && echo '
☆ Data Conversion Complete
'; else echo '
× Missing ./city-council/data/city-council-data.csv
'; fi
scripts.build:
npm run -s convert-csv && npm run -s build-data && npm run -s build-images && npm run -s build-geojson && echo '
☆ヽ(´▽｀)ノ All Done 
'
